name: Rockit!
description:
Saddle up into your trusty rocket and outmanoeuvre obstacles of increasing difficulty, surviving for as long as humanly possible. Don't worry about the repair costs of the 100s of crashed rockets, that just comes with the territory!

Rockit! is a difficult arcade game about trying to not crash rockets. Duck and weave around progressively challenging obstacles to be crowned the ultimate rocket pilot.



Key Features:

  • You get to pilot a rocket!
  • You get to crash A LOT of rockets
  • Hypothetically infinite gameplay if you're completely awful at the game or want to go for the world record on each level*

*The game typical will take about 1 hour to complete, across 25 levels
